question: 透き通る
sourceMnemonic: This is a combination of the words <ja>透ける</ja> and <ja>通る</ja>. Something that is transparent enough for things (like light) to pass through it is still going <vocabulary>to be transparent</vocabulary>, aka <vocabulary>to be see-through</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You've learned both of these readings by now so you should be able to read this on your own.
